title: Introduction to Spreadsheets for Data Analysis - Test

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of using spreadsheets?

choices: Counts the number of cells that contain numbers
Counts the total number of cells in a range

questions.question: Which data entry technique automatically fills cells with a series or pattern?

questions.question: Which feature allows you to rearrange data in ascending or descending order?
